keyMoments.title: Flying Fish Riders Assault on Thousand Sunny
keyMoments.description: The Flying Fish Riders launch coordinated aerial attacks on the Straw Hat Pirates' ship with grenades and harpoons.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's tactical combat abilities and their loyalty to Duval's vendetta.

keyMoments.title: Duval's Identity Revealed
keyMoments.description: The crew's leader Duval is revealed to look exactly like Sanji's wanted poster, explaining their attacks on the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Provides context for the crew's entire motivation and conflict with the Straw Hat Pirates.

affiliations.description: The Flying Fish Riders work alongside the Macro Pirates in kidnapping operations.

goals: Seek revenge on Sanji for the wanted poster
Control of waters near Sabaody Archipelago
description: A pirate crew led by the masked Duval that rides flying fish for aerial combat and mobility. They conduct kidnapping operations in alliance with the Macro Pirates near Sabaody Archipelago.
